channel.title: Need Help
channel.description:
Hey, I need help on Portforwording I think lol. Im trying to make my own Mopar server. And I need people to be able to connect but ya... this is wat i need, I was Reading Stormcutters post and this is what I need. Posted By Stormcutter
Step 6.5- Only for people who have routers Portforwarding If you did step 6 and when you tried to login using the ip you made and it said "error connecting to server," that means you will need to portforward and run no-ip.
I cant do his TUT on this because i dont have linksys router. I have an Actiontec router. The Interface is all different. Can someone tell me how. Thanks [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2008, 06:17:23 pm[/size][hr]Plz help, ill rep u

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @99wc3 99wc3
item.description:
@99wc3 wrote:

Hey,

I need help on Portforwording I think lol. Im trying to make my own Mopar server. And I need people to be able to connect but ya… this is wat i need, I was Reading Stormcutters post and this is what I need.

Posted By Stormcutter

Step 6.5- Only for people who have routers Portforwarding

If you did step 6 and when you tried to login using the ip you made and it said “error connecting to server,” that means you will need to portforward and run no-ip.

I cant do his TUT on this because i dont have linksys router. I have an Actiontec router. The Interface is all different. Can someone tell me how.

Thanks [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2008, 06:17:23 pm[/size][hr]Plz help, ill rep u

Read full topic
